Review.Titre: This is the 2nd time I have been burned…
Review.Contenu: This is the 2nd time I have been burned or scammed by this company and it will Definitely be the last time. Review.Titre: Horrible customer service and shipping
Review.Contenu: Ordered 9 face masks and 2 hats 4 weeks ago and have received 2 face masks.  They have never answered there phone or returned calls after many attempts of contacting them.  I highly recommend shopping elsewhere!!!Update #1:  they did finally return my money for one of my orders but I’m still waiting on the rest of my products from my other order.Update #2: all of my items have finally arrived 3 days before the one month mark.  I will say that the quality has always been good but I probably won’t ever order from them again solely based off the fact that the importance of customer service just doesn’t seem to exist anymore.

Review.Titre: Missing items in order and Terrible customer service
Review.Contenu: Missing items in order and Terrible customer service. On November 8th I ordered seven sweatshirt deals. After receiving my order and opening it I only received three sweatshirts and three trapper hats. After calling and leaving my name and number multiple times for a call back I never received a call back. I then went on the computer to talk with a customer service her name was karol she told me my order was split in half and was sent from a different Warehouse that she would get back to me within 48 hours to 72 hours with a tracking number . After 72 hours and no tracking number I decided to get back on and talk to customer service once again I got a Karol she told me something was wrong with there end and didn't get a tracking number. She then asked what I was missing for my order once again I told her 4 sweatshirts and four hats. she then told me that my case would be turned over to her supervisor they would get a hold of me by email it's been 4 days and I've not yet received any reach out from anybody.

When they finally sent a tracking number, that tracking number did not show up in the system for three days then, it made it to Denver and I could not obtain any further tracking details for 6 days. On day 6 it was delivered by the USPS. No tracking ever indicated the package had left Denver.

When I started the return I received $11 less then what was charged. So because of this deceptive business practice I am out of pocket $21($11 + $10 original shipping) for no product.

That was on 2-9-23. The invoice included with the shipment showed the item listed but it wasn’t packed and shipped. If they were trying to lose me as a customer…mission accomplished.

I email the company and go back and forth with a representative named Joseph L who keeps insisting that the package is on it’s way and I just need to be patient because some orders can take up to 20 days. 22 days after placing the order I decided to call customer service. They inform me that one of the items I ordered was not available (they couldn’t have emailed me weeks prior?). So this whole time their customer service rep has been lying to me saying that the package is on the way when, in fact, it had never shipped. The person on the phone offered to credit me for the item but I was so disappointed in the service that I had them cancel the entire order. Absolutely terrible experience. Will never buy from this company again.

Review.Contenu: I placed my order on 2/5/2023. I waited 3 weeks searching for my tracking information and I couldn't find anything on my order shipping. I attempted calling and leaving a message with no call back, I tried the online chat bot that didn't work, but I got an email asking how my service was with ".....",  after multiple failed attempt for online help. I was able to get help through email. I talked to one lady and they stated that 3 of my 6 items were out of stock and would not be back in till next year, we are in February. They offered to switch the out of stock items for others but when I went online they had the last time on the list in stock. I emailed back asking why it shows online that it was available and how can I tell if the item i want to switch out is in stock or not.  I got a short answer you can look online.  I again asked the same question how do I known if it's in stock or not. I got a short answer of a website link to the sweaters on the website, still showing the sweater available. I finally had to call on 3/10/2023 and Valerie helped and stated only one of the 3 was not available. Which was one I didn't look up online. however, it was the one I wanted most for myself. I was able to switch it for something I really didn't want another black hoodie but at least the other 5 sweaters for my family might arrive before winters over.  I asked why I had to call to find out it wasn't shipping and if I didn't call would they just take my money and never ship? she said it must have been an error in the system, a classic none answer.

Review.Titre: Veteran customer upset with order process!
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed with the way my order went.  First of all, it took 11 days for my order to reach me from Florida to Missouri.  The reason being is that DHL (slowest company ever) was involved in transferring my order to US Postal Service.  After reaching the final big city before arriving to my local post office, it was held up another three days (St. Louis is 2 hrs from my home).  After finally receiving my order, you left out 3 items from it!  Now, I will have to wait another 7 - 11 days for those items.  While at the SA Company website to find out what happened to the rest of my order prior to finally reaching them by phone after 3 days of trying to call or chat, The lady I spoke to spoke as if she did not care about my frustration or complaint and never apologized.  By the way, if your chat says a customer service agent will be with you in five minutes, and, it shows your live online, then that five minutes should be accurate, not never show up!  it took calling 4 -5 times to finally reach a person by phone (the rude lady beforementioned).  I was told I was sent an email about my siutation, at least I got that within 24 hrs as stated by their phone message.  Basically this company wants to avoid phone calls and chat and keep you guessing if you're order will make it when they screw up.  This issue gives me that impression at least.  When I shell out almost $70 of my hard earned money, I expect better communication, as well as better customer service.  If you're not going to use your chat or answer the phone number you provided as contact then take them down!  Under staffing is no excuse anymore!  You can adjust by limiting your contact to a certain way in order to handle customer needs in a timely manner.  Lastly, not everyone is comfortable with just email communication when "shelling out" the amount of money that I did for this recent order. I used to receive any products from your company within a week easily.  Now you guys are "dropping the ball" and have lost my business!  There are plenty of other companies out there that offer products just like yours!

Review.Contenu: Customer service was awful. Sent 2 emails and left 2 voicemails(because they rarely answer their phones) and never received a single response back. Only time I got a response was when I used their “live chat” robot, and even that took nearly 24 hrs before customer service rep. Came to help. The main issue I had before dealing with customer service debacle is the fact that my “size 30” board shorts actually measured 33 inches at the waist. Turns out that’s how all of their board shorts are. The actual waist size is larger than the labeled size number, which is confusing and frankly makes no sense. Anyways, after plenty of time wasted trying to contact them with no response, I figured it was worth letting others know how they conduct their business. Which is unfortunate because I like their face shields and hats. Hence the 2 stars instead of 1

I have our based a lot from this company, but this is my last. If I did not need it for Christmas present, I would have walked.The website and the reps musled me.

It's a love/hate relationship. I love your products not so much on business ethics.

Completed my order, but got it cheaper without using the “custom link”. I immediately unsubscribed from both the email and text lists. Review.Titre: I placed two orders with SA
Review.Contenu: I placed two orders with SA. The first was almost two weeks in arriving, with no updates or information as to why. It appeared the first order did not ship for a long time, it did not appear to be shipping g issues. When the product did arrive, I was very pleased with the quality.The second time I ordered I again went over 10 days without an update as to the status of my order so I reached out. The Customer Service response was prompt, and useful. Unfortunately, what they found out out was one of the shirts I ordered was out of stock, and not likely to be back in stock any time soon? Why wasn’t I notified of this sooner? Only after I reached out did I learn this information. If I had been notified of the back order in a timely manner I likely would have had the remainder of the order shipped to me. But, due to the previous (poor) experience I canceled the entire order.Again, was pleased with the quality of the first order when it finally arrived. If customer service was as strong as sales efforts (SA constantly notifies me of sales and deals via text) it would be an improvement.Haven’t decided if I’ll ever order again or not. Unfortunately, as of right now it is a “no”. Communication with your customers is important, folks, even if the news/updates isn’t good.

Review.Titre: I ordered this back on October 16th
Review.Contenu: I ordered this back on October 16th.  The link I received for DHL shows that on October 17th they were still waiting for the package and it still shows this. I still have not received my order. It would be different if their system showed that they received it and it was in transit but it still shows they haven't gotten the package. DHL is the worst shipping company so now I feel like I will never receive anything.

Review.Titre: Poor shipping and web sitee silicone ring colours that they…
Review.Contenu: Poor website 4colours.The silicone ring colours that they show on the website are not necessarily the colors that you get. One ring they show on the website  is quite an orange colour. What I got was a very brown color. VERY VERY DIFFERENT. They also claim quick shipping. HA!!! The package says expedited air mail. My shipment was sent to Miami, and then to Toronto, after that I could not track it. It was in Toronto on Oct. 21st. I received my package on Nov. 4th. I could drive to Toronto and back and have my package 10 days SOONER. NOT IMPRESSED.Do not think  I will order from this company again.

Review.Titre: I have not gotten my order
Review.Contenu: I have not gotten my order and usps does not have it because there is no delivery date

Review.Titre: After ordering
Review.Contenu: After ordering, my product was delivered to a residence in Florida, I live in Canada. The customer service after this mishap was in fact exceptional. Hopefully it won’t happen again on future orders. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Free shipping didn't work with Black Friday Sale
Review.Contenu: Put 2 hoodies for $60 in my cart, couldn't use the free shipping. Plus, then the site charged sales tax but in Minnesota there isn't tax on clothing.

Review.Titre: Haven't heard back from them
Review.Contenu: I did the buy one get 6 rings special and I only got 5 of the rings. I did send an email and still haven't heard a reply. We love the rings. My husband was really looking forward to getting the one ring that we ended up being shorted from.

Review.Titre: I ordered a hoodie pack on Oct
Review.Contenu: I ordered a hoodie pack on Oct. 25th. On Oct 27th i received a text saying my order has shipped. Oct 28th i received an email saying that my order has not shipped due to one item not in stock. I didnt see this email for 5 days. I have been tryi g since Nov 3rd to get someone to tell me what is going on. I have called, left voicemails and even communicated through text. I keep getting told they will figure this out, but then i never hear back. It has been 11 days of me contacting them and still no one has an answer. The money has been pulled from my account without issue. So i have done my end. I have ordered several times before this and never had an issue. But it seems no one knows how to handle issues in the company. The products are of very good quality. I plan to order still in the future. But i should already have my items, but still my order has not shipped and it is Nov 15th. Someone that has some seniority in the company should really contact me please.

Review.Titre: Email of order shipment received, not true
Review.Contenu: Order said it had shipped and then I was contacted a week later saying they no longer had my item in stock and I would have to chose something to replace it or receive a refund. They did replace the item with a similar one of my choice but I was disappointed that I received the email stating the order had shipped in thr first place when that clearly wasn't true

Review.Titre: Just realized that two of the ones I…
Review.Contenu: Just realized that two of the ones I ordered were two colours I didn't order.And had two buy some more as they don't come in pairs .but quality is very good

Review.Titre: My order was supposed to have two…
Review.Contenu: My order was supposed to have two mystery masks and all I got was the 5 fleece I ordered

Review.Titre: Disappointed on deal
Review.Contenu: On your page it said there was free shipping on purchases over 50$ so I added other deals in order the get free shipping but at the end y’all still wanted to charge me 15$ for shipping so I ended up taking thinks out that really disappointed me

Review.Titre: The hoodie was not like the picture you…
Review.Contenu: The hoodie was not like the picture you couldn’t even tell it was a flag in the hood and I was missing 2 fleece lined face shields which were supposed to be birthday gifts but will now be super super late for them

Review.Titre: Don’t honestly know
Review.Contenu: It’s honestly hard to determine if this whole thing is a scam or not I will see if I ever actually receive my items

Review.Titre: My order came with the trapper hat
Review.Contenu: My order came with the trapper hat, two gaiters and arm sleeve.Only one slave. Not sure what someone is supposed to do with one?Have ordered from SA before and was happy.

Review.Titre: Hoodies really run small
Review.Contenu: Hoodies really run small, gave mine away the 3x fits like a 2x . Face mask are what I expected. I’ve purchased many masks and no problems. Guess I’ll have to stick with Carhartt hoodies

Review.Titre: Don't get the add on mystery gifts
Review.Contenu: Don't get the add on mystery gifts. They send you duplicates of the most undesirable selections.

Review.Titre: Shipping time
Review.Contenu: I can’t really comment on the product as it hasn’t arrived yet after almost 3 weeks since it shipped. When I try to check the tracking info, the website just gives me an error/page not found.

Review.Titre: Stuck in processing limbo
Review.Contenu: Items never shipped and were stalled in processing. No communication on delay or ETA for arriva

Review.Titre: Fleece mask are not one size fits all…
Review.Contenu: Fleece mask are not one size fits all they are super small if you got big head they will not fit

Review.Titre: Not satisfied
Review.Contenu: Slow shippingPoor customer serviceProducts made in ChinaWill NOT be a returning customer

Review.Titre: Illiterate and color blind
Review.Contenu: Love all the products, but I purchased a od green beanie and was sent a black one. After 3 days of going back and forth on exchanging for the original that I ordered they are out of stock. Go figure! They need to hire people that are not illiterate and color blind!! Get your stuff together!!

Review.Titre: Don’t expect order anytime soon!
Review.Contenu: The product is great the service was absolutely terrible. My order was supposed to go out priority and it took 9 days for me to receive my order. So what was supposed to go overnight took 9 days. So I won’t be ordering from SA Fishing anytime soon.

Review.Titre: Only sent half of my order
Review.Contenu: Only sent half of my order. I ordered 16 buffs and only received 8. Extremely disappointing

Review.Titre: time to get
Review.Contenu: it took along time to arrive and we didnt get to use items on Ski trip.

Review.Titre: Late and missing items
Review.Contenu: Package sat at DHL for 5 days. When it arrives there was an item missing. All customer.service did was semd me a tracking number that I already had. In all not a food experience Will mot be ordering from them again.

Review.Titre: Inaccurate product description and poor customer service.
Review.Contenu: Website did not mention that the Bullet Antenna was not compatible with my vehicle, so I ordered it. I tried to resolve this with customer support, but they were not helpful. I asked for someone to call me, but they refused. I’m still trying to get my full refund.

Review.Titre: Taken advantage of
Review.Contenu: Everything was extremely marked down right after I received it.. paid almost double for it

Review.Titre: I bought some stuff off of you about 4…
Review.Contenu: I bought some stuff off of you about 4 hours ago how you're sending me an email asking me to write you how you did give it done anything I haven't even got products that I ordered you might even send me what I want how stupid are you sitting on an email obviously you don't know what you're doing you wouldn't be asking for a rating before I get the product somebody goes to idiot

Review.Titre: The straw hat is only one size
Review.Contenu: The straw hat is only one size. It is too big. It wants to go over my ears. You should make them in different sizes.

Review.Titre: 15% credit issue
Review.Contenu: I did not realize that I needed to open the email with the 15% discount code until after I completed the order so I did not get to use it. The pressure of the clock counting down made me feel like I needed to complete the transaction ASAP. Wish you had automatically given me the credit instead of having to leave my order, open email, find the offer in my junk folder, go back to my order, and add the discount code. It made me feel like the offer was not genuine.

Review.Titre: Product quality is ok
Review.Contenu: Product quality is ok, trapper hat is a bit thin for less warmth, bucket hat is tight and I don't have a huge head. Placed order and it just sat there at that point until I reached out only the find out that the "free bonus item" I was given the option to choose was out of stock so my order wasn't shipping and no one was going to reach out to me about that.

Review.Titre: First time buyer
Review.Contenu: First time buyer. I kept seeing ads on Facebook for a sale they were doing. Figured I would give it a shot. I ordered it the first part of January and apparently what they said was in stock was out. They said there would be a delay but they never responded back to me about my order. It finally showed up yesterday (1/23) I did finally receive an email that it was delivered. A little disappointed that they never responded to me.

Review.Titre: Added items to my cart but didn’t check…
Review.Contenu: Added items to my cart but didn’t check out. The next day I get an email saying get and extra 15% off my cart and a discount code. When I did check out and entered the code it would not apply it to my order because my order didn’t qualify for the offer. Despite the email saying it did.

Review.Titre: It took forever to get my order
Review.Contenu: It took forever to get my order. It was supposed to be a deal that I didn't get. They also said they would send a special gift for the order taking so long, but I didn't get that either. They have quality stuff, but I'll never believe what they tell me again. Actually I'll probably never buy from them again.

Review.Titre: Cart Issues
Review.Contenu: I tried adding items 4 times to the cart and they would not add at all. Ended up having to refresh the page numerous for the first time buyer code to work properly. I would fill out the pack, go to checkout, and it added different items then what I picked from the pack itself. After it all saved properly to the cart the checkout was fast, easy, and smooth.

Review.Titre: Great product, awful shipping
Review.Contenu: Silicone rings: 5/5Shipping: 2/5I like the material. I work on cars for a living and I have no complaints with the quality of their product. The shipping that SA Company uses is easily the worst experience I've had with purchasing any product that requires shipping. No updates, ever; and I ordered my stuff a week ago.

Review.Titre: Why such a small selection????
Review.Contenu: I haven’t been to the site in a while.  But I notice my choices for selecting my 8pk deal was minimal.  Whereas before when I bought my head rags you had so so many.  Not sure if that was done on purpose or you just don’t have that large selection any more.  I was not happy with such a small selection.   Who knows maybe it was a user error and I didn’t see the option to allow me to see all the other selections.

Review.Titre: Not bad, but could use improvement
Review.Contenu: I like the pricing and the gift packages. What I dislike is the fact my order was placed on Sunday and was told that per email, my order was placed today and was shipping today. I also don't like how you don't get a choice of shipping methods. It's shipping USPS but I'd rather have it come via UPS due to the fact that it's a postal box so if I can't make it to the post office by the time they close, it could take days longer to be able to receive my package

Review.Titre: Great product, customer service, not so much.
Review.Contenu: I have ordered their regular face shields in the past. I decided on purchasing the lined face shields. I do really like the shields, they work as advertised. It's the customer service that caused the 3 star rating. I had a problem with one of the tags that could not be removed without ruining the material. I sent an email along with pictures and I never heard back from them. I then tried to contact them via messenger on Facebook. I never did get a response.

Review.Titre: I’ll admit I f*caked up the zip code
Review.Contenu: I’ll admit I f*caked up the zip code. But after reaching out to get the address changed, I didn’t hear anything after the initial response email for almost 2 weeks. I waited for my package that would never come because, Once I reached out again, I needed to be charged for another shipping and handling fee. Fine - it was my mistake. Just want these face shields already. Communication could have been better.

Review.Titre: Problem with free shipping was excited to order as I have seen…
Review.Contenu: I was excited to order as I have seen this a couple times on FB. The process to order was terrible! Perhaps it was me but nothing seemed clear as I ordered because it was free shipping. As I completed my order it was charging shipping. In my mind that's a red glad for a dishonest company. You did make it right by sending me a code in my email after I complained.

Review.Titre: Silicone Rings
Review.Contenu: My last order of rings came with all sizes ordered except one which was sent wrong, which was way too small. The size I ordered actually didn’t even fit because they were too big, this was after using the size chart to assess the best size. Quality of ring seems good however it keeps slipping off. I’ve ordered another set in a smaller size, so will hopefully get a better fit, and I can make a more accurate review. Overall, happy with the price deal of buy 1 get 4 free!

Review.Titre: Bit pushy but not bad
Review.Contenu: The trapper hats are a good product at a really good price.  However the shipping is slow and when you order they don't even give you a rough estimate of how long it will take. They will also try to shove other products down your throat even while you're trying to purchase something

Review.Titre: I really like almost everything I’ve…
Review.Contenu: I really like almost everything I’ve received from you. However I recently used my bag while going on a hike and when I got back I noticed that the stitching has come undone so now I’m trying to fix my bag since I’ve only used it once. This is the only product that I’ve had issues with so was a bit disappointed

Review.Titre: Well I love your gear
Review.Contenu: Well I love your gear. I bought the hoodie package. Hoodie is very comfortable, love the material. Love the face and neck warmers. But I did not receive the brown trapper hat. I had already emailed SA company about it and they got back to me immediately which is awesome and are mailing me another trapper hat. I will defently continue to purchase your gear. Just hope it doesn't happen again. I know it being the holidays and all you are all very busy but I am very happy with the fast response to the issue. Happy holidays

Review.Titre: Almost a month and still no order
Review.Contenu: Made a purchase on November 28th for a Christmas gift to give plenty of time for the items to come in before Christmas. It is now December 20th and still no package. The rep was nice but could only provide tracking and stated she was send a inquiry to the postal service. Still nothing or follow up.

Review.Titre: Good products
Review.Contenu: Overall, everything was pretty good. I got my products on time, and they were of good quality. I was looking forward to having a silicone ring more than anything, and even though it was a "random" gift, I wish it would've been any other color than pink. I figured it's alright since the other products work well.

Review.Titre: Free shipping, or not free shipping?
Review.Contenu: While I was placing the order, the app informed me that I was $15 away from free shipping. I spent the time to find some additional items to get me to $55 total to get free shipping. At that point the app told me my order "qualified" for free shipping. Then when I went to pay, it was charging an extra $15 for shipping. I contacted customer service and was told even though the app said my order had qualified for free shipping, that since I had ordered from the "oops, we made too much" inventory, that my order did NOT get free shipping, which was a little frustrating and annoying.

Review.Titre: Buy small first to see if they're for you
Review.Contenu: Decent experience. Products were lackluster. Fleece neck warmers were too small for an average sized head and neck. Difficult to actually get on due to an inner and outer layer competing against one another, and felt stifling while on and difficult to breathe through. Trapper hat was too shallow and felt like wearing a skull cap. Arm sleeves didn't hold their shape and became loose on average sized arms and started to slide down past the end of a t shirt, making you look ridiculous. (Bought size s/m too). Overall, I probably won't use any of the 6 items I purchased, which is a shame.

Review.Titre: Be patient
Review.Contenu: I have ordered items from SA before and was not completely satisfied with complete process and up front shipping/delivery information.( non-existent)Well nothing has changed . The product is quality and has been as expected.I look forward recurve to the hoodie pack I purchased.

Review.Titre: Didn’t like waiting 4 months to find…
Review.Contenu: Didn’t like waiting 4 months to find out order was probably lost and had to reorder with some items not being available do to no more stock also replying was slow but once it was resolved it was done in a timely manner well done for that hope to see the merchandise the same way!

Review.Titre: I usually really enjoy the products…
Review.Contenu: I usually really enjoy the products from SA. This time however I was inquiring on an order I had placed a couple weeks ago and at that point  I contacted customer service I was made aware that I only paid for the shipping. I clearly did not intend to do that. I am shocked that the order was able to be processed. I should have been made aware of this sooner and I would have corrected it. Now I don't think my order will arrive by Christmas. I normally have good experience with SA but now I am questioning buying things in the future.

Review.Titre: Free shipping??
Review.Contenu: Your site said I got free shipping by adding more in my bag so I did, then you charged me 15 in shipping anyway.  I like your gear, next time just tell me I have to pay shipping and I won't keep adding to my basket to try and get the free shipping

Review.Titre: Please satisfied with everything except…
Review.Contenu: Please satisfied with everything except for this one small problem.This is the 2nd time this happened.  Total price was over $55 for free shipping  . Actually $65. Then you go to checkout and it says that I don't qualify for free shipping. I don't get it.

Review.Titre: Love the products but my order was over…
Review.Contenu: Love the products but my order was over the required $55 for free shipping. I did not receive it. Cancelled my order. SA sent me a free shipping code to finish my order. Then says since it was clearance items that they couldn't do free shipping, I should have received anyways.

Review.Titre: I like the product but I think the…
Review.Contenu: I like the product but I think the shipping cost is too much for the time it took to get the product. It took over a week to arrive, in the same state it was shipped. I’ll seriously consider this in deciding whether to order again.

Review.Titre: Don’t fall for the $25 bonus item scam
Review.Contenu: I received everything that I ordered and i do like what I purchased. It’s not perfect quality but decent for the price. The reason I am only giving 3 stars is because they claim they will give $25 of bonus stuff with your order and that is not the case and what seems to be a scam. When I didn’t receive my bonus stuff I emailed them and after some back and forth emails I was given the option to choose from some things like a sticker and a can cookie. For $25!? Funny how you can get 8 face shields for $16 but  for a bonus first time buyer you get a sticker for $25. I would suggest ordering elsewhere just because of that.

Review.Titre: I saw one price and when I went to…
Review.Contenu: I saw one price and when I went to order the rings they were an other price but thought I was confused. Then two days after I order the price went down to the price I thought I saw jut leave them at the lower price so people like me don't get screwed.

Review.Titre: In the past I would have given five…
Review.Contenu: In the past I would have given five stars this company's been very good very tentative with their orders always been spot on. This time two- three stars. Failed to notify out of stock items. Customer service was good when contacted. Shipping took like a week and a half two weeks something like that. When received items were missing. Again contacted customer service customer service was good. The part I find troubling is when I place my order all these items were in stock and I had to settle for something else due to being forgotten about. Which I get it stuff happened man but to not be notified that's messed up

Review.Titre: It was okay not the greatest but they just sent me half…
Review.Contenu: It was okay but they just sent me half the right order. I ended up getting two different bundles and they sent me doubles of everything instead of giving me exactly what I asked for and paid for. So that kinda sucks

Review.Titre: Would of given five stars but all but…
Review.Contenu: Would of given five stars but all but one of the male rings were sold out in my size. Settled or others though.I know I was later in the sale but should have more in stock for the ones your going to include in the special. But everything thing else was great. Will have to see the quality of the rings when they get here.

Review.Titre: Caution buying multiple sizes
Review.Contenu: I received an email with an offer for a great deal on performance shirts and hoodies. After looking through the selections, I found some shirts I wanted. I selected the sizes and added to my cart. I proceeded to continue my checkout process only to find the sizes I had selected were changed and now they were all the same sizes of the same shirt. I contacted customer service and after 3+ days was provided a link to complete my order. I followed the link and paid for the items. I then noticed the sizes were showing the same as what I saw when I added them to my cart. I reached out to customer service again, via text, and after 2 hours of back and forth communication, was told the order has been adjusted and will ship out soon. On a previous order, November 2022, I ordered some hoodies and was excited when they came in; they were better than what the website showed. Unfortunately, within the last few weeks, I have noticed, the material on the sleeve of one of the hoodies is starting to fall apart and is almost transparent/see through. 😬I have purchased multiple items and have liked all of it… until this situation.

Review.Titre: Black Friday 40% off everything…
Review.Contenu: Black Friday 40% off everything sitewide orders greater than $50 | Code: BF22 This promo did not work. It states that it does not work on clearance, however, it clearly states 40% off EVERYTHING SITEWIDE on orders of 50 or more. Did not receive free gift with either package I ordered and did not receive free gift or free shipping that is supposed to be a VIP perk. Chat wasn't working, email customer service wasn't working, very disappointing.

Review.Titre: Love the trapper hat but Chinese made
Review.Contenu: Love the trapper hat, don't like the beanie, way too small even for my son. I thought these were quality American made products which is why I ordered from Canada but everything is made in China.

Review.Titre: Repeat customer exp
Review.Contenu: Repeat customer. Fleece face masks are excellent. Regular face masks are OK. Sweatshirts seem OK, not overly soft or well made, but they are a low cost sweatshirt to wear out and about. Loggers/trappers hats are honestly pretty low quality and not overly comfortable, I do not know I’ll get much use from this. Woven fleece hat is better made. I have appreciated the warmth in less cold (30F) conditions, walking in the dark in town is made more comfortable with the reflective.Overall, I’ve had a good experience, but there are items I will not repurchase or potentially use much. Fleece face masks though.. those are a go to. I’ve bought more than a few for myself, and more for family.

Review.Titre: I've bought several items from this…
Review.Contenu: I've bought several items from this company. Straw hats. Performance shirts arm sleeves and some hoodies. Really good experience great products. I do feel likebthe sizes are smaller than they use to be though.

Review.Titre: Shipping took a long time
Review.Contenu: Shipping took a long time. Quality is good but the neck gaiters are a bit snug. One size fits all? If I dry them in a dryer forget about it. Will never fit. I would not purchase them again due to the fit.

Review.Titre: Like the products could have sent me an…
Review.Contenu: Like the products could have sent me an email regarding not in stock anytime soon instead of me doing the foot work order was almost a month ordered but thanks for quick response and refund I will reorder in the future

Review.Titre: I could not find a sizing guide for the…
Review.Contenu: I could not find a sizing guide for the rings, and in waiting for the chat line during working hours, since I can't find a phone number, it's been 45 minutes since I sent my first request for a chat.

Review.Titre: Update....my gaiters arrived today 11/25/22
Review.Contenu: I ordered gaiters and I am still waiting for them to arrive....I received notice, 11/18/22, they were shipped and they STILL have not arrived! I am instead being email bombed with NUMEROUS emails to buy more! Update: My whole order arrived today...I was getting nervous after reading the one star reviews, and it was taking longer than I thought it should...Now a

Review.Titre: Free shipping not applied
Review.Contenu: I would have purchased more and was ready-to-wear check out because it said my order qualified for fres shipping, and then I was charged for shipping.   I am not happy about that part.

Review.Titre: Less selection than they used to have..
Review.Contenu: Less selection than they used to have and prices have increased as well while the quality has lessened (thinner fabrics). Therefore, there's no justification for why the changes were made.

Review.Titre: Hats are warm and comfortable but…
Review.Contenu: Hats are warm and comfortable but different sizes. The quilted trapper hat fit snug around my whole head while the canvas trapper hat has alot of extra room and fits kinda like a bucket.

Review.Titre: Foreign company American Address
Review.Contenu: Foreign company hiding behind an American business address. Very deceptive with their practices and I can guarantee there will be no free shipping. Caveat Emptor - you get what you pay for.

Review.Titre: The prices are right but I am having…
Review.Contenu: The prices are right but I am having issues with the order being excepted online. I messaged online and was told to wait 24 hrs and then try again and I sure with that being said the prices will be regular prices.

Review.Titre: Fast order
Review.Contenu: My order was quick, I've ordered from SA before. The only challenge was my email kept getting sent back as invalid. Don't use autofil and it'll be fine.

Review.Titre: Not happy at all.still havent received…
Review.Contenu: Not happy at all.still havent received my order.last time i complained,they said it was because of a back order of one of my selected.been way too long,and still no reply or even a courtesy email,text....nothin.this rating will go lower the longer i have to wait.

Review.Titre: The website is easy
Review.Contenu: The website is easy, the selection decent the purchase easy.  The shipping is ridiculous .  It took 3 weeks to arrive after they said it shipped ...

Review.Titre: I found the trapper hat to fit a size…
Review.Contenu: I found the trapper hat to fit a size smaller than it should. The quality is ok but the imitation fur is not to appealing as it appears very matted and dirty looking.

Review.Titre: I ordered 5 rings back in December
Review.Contenu: I ordered 5 rings back in December, and I have yet to receive any notifications that the order has been filled or mailed? The payment was taken out on December 26.

Review.Titre: Needs to be delivered in bigger box
Review.Contenu: That hat is really cool and has an awesome design but it was shipped in a small box so the ends had to be folded back to fit in it and all the straw where it was folded is ripped.

Review.Titre: For $20 it's ok
Review.Contenu: For $20 it's not bad really, but everything is pretty low quality. Also, maybe i just have a big head, but it's tough to pull my head through the regular and fleece lined buffs

Review.Titre: I'm still waiting for my order the ads…
Review.Contenu: I'm still waiting for my order the ads look pretty good I hope the product works. I have bought an facials four from this company in which I still have some of them

Review.Titre: Shipping price was a major issue
Review.Contenu: Shipping price was a major issue.  Told me if my order reached $50.00, the shipping would be free.  Shipping cost was $21.75.  I reduced my order to reduce shipping.

Review.Titre: My first order I was supposed to get a…
Review.Contenu: My first order I was supposed to get a free face covering and on my last order I didn't get the little black ring bag and I ordered size 12 rings and yall sent 2 of them size 11

Review.Titre: Outrageous shipping/false information
Review.Contenu: I received emails telling me there were BOGO and FREE shipping.  Ordered my BOGO items but ended up having to pay $50 in shipping, as I was given no other options!  Kind of defeats the purpose of having a BOGO sale!

Review.Titre: Something happen with my order and it…
Review.Contenu: Something happen with my order and it never came . Then someone fixed the problem but now I ordered a size to small and am now afraid to send back

Review.Titre: Look for the best deal just dig a little
Review.Contenu: This is my 3rd time buying from SA great and cheap play for masks. I really like there products they help in the winter keep my neck warm and keeping the air out of my shirt. This time I ordered arm sleeves. My only problem was I found a better deal on the site right after i ordered my stuff. I ordered the buy 1 get 3 free plus a free mystery one. Then I saw buy 1 get 5 free plus the mystery one. For 15$ plus I had free shipping

Review.Titre: Prices were great
Review.Contenu: Prices were great, was pushed to buy more to get free shipping but at checkout my order was not qualified for free shipping so I went back and cut my item short

Review.Titre: I would give a higher rating if not for…
Review.Contenu: I would give a higher rating if not for the fact I almost bought an 8 pack of regular face shields for $24 when there was another 8 pack of the exact same product for $16 it's very miss leading when you have 2 of the same packs at different prices

Review.Titre: Great products. Some items missing.
Review.Contenu: The products I ordered are great. There was a free "bonus" item that was supposed to come with the other items that never arrived.

Review.Titre: Order was easy
Review.Contenu: Order was easy Not as many selections as before Haven’t received my order yet

Review.Titre: Supposed to be free shipping on orders…

Review.Contenu: Haven't got my package yet. 19 dollars for shipping and it's been 2 weeks? Do better. Also tracking info sent via email doesn't work

Review.Titre: Clean Up Ordering Process
Review.Contenu: Love this companies products but always frustrated ordering on their page. Screens slide up and down, makes ordering confusing.

Review.Titre: Order was incomplete
Review.Contenu: Order was incomplete.  When I had 2 Black Friday deals in my cart the page showed" add more"  to get free shipping.  I added more to get free shipping then it says $15 shipping because of Clearance Items But All were Black Friday Deals ?

Review.Titre: Nice colors but a bit tight
Review.Contenu: The colors of fleece neck warmer very nice. But it's tight on the neck and no real stretch to increase comfort for man with 18" neck.

Review.Titre: You guys would have more options on the…
