Review.Contenu: Offered me 15% off and a free gift since it was my first order but only the discount applied. Hopefully a Gordy will come in the mail…

Review.Titre: Screw stripped within the first minute…
Review.Contenu: Screw stripped within the first minute of installation. The antenna cover that I bought didn't tighten down well on my truck. Within just a few turns, it loosened and was stripped. If the screws were longer and didn't strip, they would be great.

Review.Titre: The beanie I ordered recently was too…
Review.Contenu: The beanie I ordered recently was too small for me, but the fleece face shield keeps my face warm and those I’m very happy with.

Review.Titre: Just a couple issues...
Review.Contenu: They never shipped one ring (Black and Red). They are shipping it to me now.I complained about the RASTA ring. It looks nothing like the picture on display. It does not even look like a RASTA ring. I sent pictures and was basically told... OH WELL.Everything else was great.

Review.Titre: Was supposed to get free shipping but I didn't
Review.Contenu: When I ordered the trapper hats, it said I qualified for free shipping because I spent over $55 but I still got charged for shipping

Review.Titre: Would be 5 stars but y’all need to…
Review.Contenu: Would be 5 stars but y’all need to update your website to say out of stock then contact the customer and see if they want to wait or change their order to get it to ship I waited two weeks before reaching out to see about my order since nobody on your end did.

Review.Titre: Products are great
Review.Contenu: Products are great! Local shipping is expensive also don’t have any regular men straw or palm hats available.

Review.Titre: Very good product pity that this…
Review.Contenu: Very good product pity that this delivery I could not follow the order which earned me 15 € of return costs packages.

Review.Titre: I like your product just not the graphics
Review.Contenu: I like your product just not the graphics so much. I dont really want to promote a brand by wearing their swag. I would get tired of explaining what SA stands for when no one has a clue about the brand. Why not offer your product without the SA graphics?

Review.Titre: Watch the free shipping
Review.Contenu: Loved the sales prices but was dissatisfied with the free shipping until checkout which I was then charged $21 for shipping

Review.Titre: I received a text that stated 15% off…
Review.Contenu: I received a text that stated 15% off my next order but it doesn’t state in the text that exclusions apply so it’s misleading. Maybe adding those few words will help others

Review.Titre: I ordered all men gear and got a…
Review.Contenu: I ordered all men gear and got a flowered teal neck cover. I wouldn't order again. The reat of the order was great.

Review.Titre: My order said it qualified for free…
Review.Contenu: My order said it qualified for free shipping but there were no free shipping options and I was charged for the  shipping.

Review.Titre: Communication
Review.Contenu: Never have had a problem with quality, in fact it’s above average for sure. The issue I had which I just received was the time it took to receive it. Was waiting for it because I had a big hunting trip that I was going on. I truly understand that things are back ordered but contacted you guys several times both text as well as email and you never got back to me. Sorry just a little disappointed. Ordered 10/9 got it today 11/9 (just got back from my hunt)

Review.Titre: The product is very good
Review.Contenu: The product is very good, but the post office in Brazil does not work well.  I haven't received the products yet??

Review.Titre: No free shipping?
Review.Contenu: Claimed my order would get free shipping still charged $12 for shipping. Other than that I've never had an issue with SA

Review.Titre: Love the prices that were offered by…
Review.Contenu: Love the prices that were offered by email but free shipping was possible as said because they were clearance items.

Review.Titre: Good products
Review.Contenu: Good products, but your shipping may be the slowest on the planet!!

Review.Titre: Only one issue
Review.Contenu: I love the design on the rings. My only complaint is the ones my gf and I cut they rub on the skin and peels it apart. Causing rashes and wounds

Review.Titre: I love the $40 Hoodie pack
Review.Contenu: I love the $40 Hoodie pack. However, I've only worn the hoodie a few times and already the stitching on the front pouch is already coming undone.

Review.Titre: Good products & service but repeat order errors.
Review.Contenu: I like the products and customer service is very friendly and moves incredibly quickly so it pains me a bit to rate my experience a bit lower. I ordered a multi-pack of 5 rubber wedding rings amongst other things, and when they came nearly 3 weeks later, one of the rings did not come in the order. Of course I wrote them and they replied quickly, however unfortunately that specific ring I wanted was now out of stock. I asked for a different one in bronze which they immediately shipped. I got it a couple weeks later and despite the slip saying bronze the ring was just plain black. I wrote them again, they responded quickly again and within the day had another order in progress, fortunately it was the right one this time.

Review.Titre: Can't use my discount on certain…
Review.Contenu: Can't use my discount on certain clearance kinda bs

Review.Titre: Still waiting for purchased items to be…
Review.Contenu: Still waiting for purchased items to be shipped. It’s been 13 days and USPS hasn’t received package from SA.

Review.Titre: I ordered gray sleeves and the gray is…
Review.Contenu: I ordered gray sleeves and the gray is two different color really doesn’t look rite two different colors

Review.Titre: Tight fleece lined
Review.Contenu: Fleece lined face mask is pretty tight and is a lot of bulk when pulled down. The basic original mask works great

Review.Titre: Don’t say it’s shipped when it hasn’t
Review.Contenu: Not a fan of receiving an email showing my items shipped 3-4 days ago and then pulling up the tracking number today and seeing that USPS can’t confirm the item has shipped. Working for the USPS, I pulled up an advanced search at work and got the same notification. Telling people the item has shipped when it hasn’t should be avoided. Just printing the label doesn’t mean it’s shipped yet.

Review.Titre: This is the second time I’ve ordered…
Review.Contenu: This is the second time I’ve ordered from SA. I don’t recall the lag time from ordering to delivery on the first time, but I felt the second most recent time took a long time to ship. I’m still satisfied with the product and the value.

Review.Titre: Shipping is extremely high i almost…
Review.Contenu: Shipping is extremely high i almost canceled the order. This will be the last time

Review.Titre: Great variety of rings if you like to…
Review.Contenu: Great variety of rings if you like to color coordinate work your wardrobe. I will be ordering more rings soon! Thank you!

Review.Titre: misunderstanding - REPAIRED
Review.Contenu: i would give a 5 but there is always room to improve.had an issue with my order and was contacted by customer service and the problem was resolved.i didn't know my shipment had been broken down in two different orders.

Review.Titre: Was skeptical on the purchase as it was…
Review.Contenu: Was skeptical on the purchase as it was made from a link located on Facebook.  After purchase made,  received email  confirmation of purchase and then a short time later tracking number for USPS.  After a couple days past, looked up tracking number and I was told it could not locate package.  At this point I contacted customer service and would have really liked to speak to somebody but, no one was available.  I tried the chat option and no one was available but, I did receive an email and text response a short time later. I was told it was picked up by a different carrier and it was on the way. I  Checked the tracking number at the other Carrier and the package shows it was picked up. My only suggestion is to tell customers of the 3 options of delivery and to check the tracking number on all 3.  This would have saved me time and an interruption of your day to respond.

Review.Titre: Products are great and customer service…
Review.Contenu: Products are great and customer service was very good with issues I had.  They corrected it immediately.  Will buy from again.

Review.Titre: I'll give you a 4 this time bit I…
Review.Contenu: I'll give you a 4 this time bit I really need that package to be sent to me. As much as I've ordered from you is think it would be on the house this time fire to the fact that I don't live in Columbia I live in Myrtle Beach and that number was# 3458023 please send me that order and I'll start ordering more stuff from you if you take care of this one thing for me.

Review.Titre: The price on the item was amazing
Review.Contenu: The price on the item was amazing. The purchasing process was good too, but when it came to the last stwp getting the number tied with my order, the page wouldn't load. Nothing saying my order was fulfilled. The page wouldn't load. It said if it doesn't load, try again ina. Few moments.  It never loaded.  I did get an email, but still felt odd.  Like I  wasn't going to get what I paid for, or it was out of stock.

Review.Titre: Enticing deals
Review.Contenu: Their deals are really enticing and the last minute add ons are smart. Great business model. I’ve bought their face shields before and like them. They’re not worth the full price but they have so many deals that make them worth it. I think last time I bought was a 3 shields for $20 or so. They now have fleece coverings and trapper hats which I jumped on this time.

Review.Titre: The best of the worst.
Review.Contenu: The Hoodie, fleece face shield, and regular skull face shield are excellent material. The phanny pack is smaller than expected. The can sleeve is decent. The trapper cap could use a bit more insulation to actually be that.  The order to delivery time was back logged due to the holiday season. Overall a Madd decent price on all items in the pack.

Review.Titre: I debated a 1 star
Review.Contenu: I debated a 1 star, but i realized it was out of my own issues, not of the hat. The quality is fine, the hat is fine, the price is okay. Ive been trying to replace a hat that got stolen for the past 5 years. And i just.... can't. This hat will sit in my closet till eternity, i'll never wear it. Its too big for  a simple answer.

Review.Titre: I tried several times to place my order…
Review.Contenu: I tried several times to place my order & finally quit. I got sent to “shipping” 4 times. I received an email to complete my order & tried again. While I was attempting to order again I got a text from Taylor who asked if I needed help. S/he suggested I use Chrome instead of Safari as my browser. I switched over & it went thru. It was frustrating but if not for Taylor I would have just walked away. Special credit to Taylor for working on Christmas Day!! 🙏🎁🎄

Review.Titre: I love this company and have previously…
Review.Contenu: I love this company and have previously ordered from them. Never been disappointed!! This year I ordered and some of my items were out of stock. However, I never received an email telling me that. I ordered on November 27th . I contacted them today and they were able to make it right and substitute items. Well this is great and very much appreciated, I wish I had known sooner so I could get the gifts before Christmas. I will continue to support and order from them again!

Review.Titre: as far as the products that i…
Review.Contenu: as far as the products that i received,it all was what i was looking for and in but the communication part of SA is lacking.you held off shipping my order because something was not available and whomever i talked to couldnt tell me what was missing so that i may have replaced it with something that was available.

Review.Titre: Hoodie Replacement Issue
Review.Contenu: Had an issue with a hoodie arriving with a seam that came apart. After contacting a rep I was able to get a replacement however they no longer carried the one I got originally so I had to select another one that got differently than the original. Shortly after this exchange I noticed the original one was being advertised again and that was very disappointing seeing how that's the reason I bought it was for the first one and the replacement failed to meet the same fit and comfortable and design.

Review.Titre: Great products, more beanie options please!
Review.Contenu: I have always liked this company’s products, and unfortunately lost my black SA beanie. I wasn’t able to find that beanie again, and would have liked a greater selection of beanie’s. A simple black one with the “don’t tread on me” logo/flag, or a grey or colored American flag embroidered on the front would be great.

Review.Titre: Great product
Review.Contenu: Neck gaiters are great, great value, slightly on the tight side but they stretched out nicely, warm and well made. Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars was they took 9 or 10 days to process the order and ship but fortunately I received the product in time for a ski trip. Overall great company to deal with.

Review.Titre: Great quality stuff
Review.Contenu: I really enjoy the items I purchased, except one item. I purchased some fleece pullovers that work perfectly! I also purchased a winter hat. The product was of good quality, but my head is small and it didn’t fit. I wish there was a way to tighten the hat for a better fit. Other than that, keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: Great customer service response, order updates need improvement
Review.Contenu: I placed my order on Jan 1 and received no update for weeks. When I reached out to customer service they were quick to respond. I was notified that I one part was on indefinite backorder so the entire order was on hold so I was given the option to cancel the item or select a new one. The issue was corrected in less than a day. The only reason this is not a 5 star is because I would have like to have known about the stock issue without reaching out. The customer service representative, however, saved the experience by handling the inquiry quickly.

Review.Titre: We ordered 3 gift sets that included a…
Review.Contenu: We ordered 3 gift sets that included a hoodie, gator, hat, and fleece face shield.  These were gifts for Christmas.  They took a little time to come but wasn't bad.  However, the shorted us one of the hoodies!  I contacted them by email right away...they did get back to me and asked me to prove what was sent, which I did.  They did ship the other hoody but took twice as long to get it.  I gave a 4 star cause they did make it right and was in time for Christmas.  Just was an inconvenience having to wait for the one missing piece.

Review.Titre: Their chat bot is an idiot BUT…
Review.Contenu: Their chat bot is an idiot BUT when a real person got to me they were understanding and quick to resolve my issue. Overall an excellent customer service experience.

Review.Titre: My order number is 3450743
Review.Contenu: My order number is 3450743I was charged for shipping when your site said my order qualified for free shipping I tried everything that I could at check out to get free shipping. It would not allow me to. I went ahead with my order, hoping that you would make this right.

Review.Titre: I have purchased the other face Shields…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased the other face Shields and we still use what we still have. But it's colder now so these will be better for us. Happy to see the kid one for my grandbaby, hope it fits him. It will help him in the morning's from breathing the cold air. A Satisfied Customer!!!

Review.Titre: I have not received the things I…
Review.Contenu: I have not received the things I ordered yet so this review is only on customer service and it has been great. My order got lost somewhere in the usps system, then 2 of the items I ordered were out of stock. The person I spoke with through email gave me options to choose from to replace the items that were no longer available and got my next order submitted and ready to ship in hours. I hope the product is as good as the customer service.

Review.Titre: My item states it was shipped but it has not been!!
Review.Contenu: UPDATE:My item was shipped shortly after this rating.  I have received my items.  I am happy for the most part but not the fact that I was ordering men's rings and received 2 women's rings.  I am not sure the women's rings will fit my husband.  Other than that, I am pleased with my purchase.My item states it was shipped as of Sunday, December 11th.  As of today, December 15th, the tracking information still states the USPS is awaiting the package so it has not been tendered for shipping. I understand holiday shipping can be crazy but this is not very professional.

Review.Titre: Missing 1 faceshield
Review.Contenu: I purchased a 8 face shield combo deal. I only received 7. I picked 5 mix shield and was disappointed when I noticed they gave me 3 the same and 2 the same. If I knew, I would of picked all my own 8 colours. Otherwise, the service is really good and I like your products

Review.Titre: Would have given 5.star if it wasn't…
Review.Contenu: Would have given 5.star if it wasn't for shipping costs and taxes to the UK. costs more than the hats, but am glad the hats were on offer. You do have great offers. Have purchased from you before, face masks, great for cycling, especially in cold weather.

Review.Titre: Give them a try
Review.Contenu: Only thing I would have a problem with is sometimes the face shields may be a little tight. This will be the second trapper hat I’ve  ordered . They fit well and are warm. If you need a little more warmth, put a scull cap or beanie under it. Usually not needed.

Review.Titre: Order support
Review.Contenu: Joan was able to help me out with initial issue and follow up issue with my order.   She was very patient with me bouncing around multiple browser windows/tabs sorting out problems with my order.

Review.Titre: The shipment was received in a timely…
Review.Contenu: The shipment was received in a timely manner. It was missing 1 item so I contacted the company by email. I received a replacement order number within hours.  They are very easy to work with and seem to care about customer service.

Review.Titre: Order came pretty fast
Review.Contenu: Order came pretty fast,  have ordered before and it was great,  this time we didn't receive the ring box or ring bag,  both were free so it's not too big of a deal,  but would have been 5 stars if order was actually complete.

Review.Titre: Good quality rings
Review.Contenu: I wrote a review 2 days ago about the long wait, but now that the shipment has come. I like the quality of the rings I ordered. One didn't look exactly like the photo but still looks good. I like the lifetime guarantee.

Review.Titre: Great company
Review.Contenu: I found a post on Facebook & decided to check them out after reviewing the site I decided to grab some rings, the shipping was fast, they kept me informed with shipping updates. I placed my order on 2/16 & I received them on 2/22. The rings look amazing way better in person than the site. I highly recommend this product.

Review.Titre: Customer service is really really good but webshop would need some changes to be excllent…
Review.Contenu: Customer service is really good and porducts as well. The webshop could be better like amazon.de. So if you make mistake when ordering you could do it in webshop without the help of customer service and that's why only four stars.

Review.Titre: The quality of your gear is great
Review.Contenu: The quality of your gear is great. Was very happy with the hoddie package, other than the fact the trapper hat was missing. Notified SA and got an email letting me know the hat was on its way. Great customer service.

Review.Titre: Never any complaints before this order
Review.Contenu: Never any complaints before this order. Placed an order and it wasn't shiped out correctly, but we are only human.Talked with someone today, and they shiped it out today. Will continue to support the company.

Review.Titre: The quality of the items is fantastic
Review.Contenu: The quality of the items is fantastic. It truly is. Why it doesn't get a 5 rating is because I've ordered multiple times from this company there is about a 50% chance that something happens with the shipping. But overall 4 out 5

Review.Titre: They messed up an order but it’s ok…
Review.Contenu: They messed up an order but it’s ok customer service is awesome and fast! I love my hoodie and the rings are wonderful the face shields have great craftsmanship and the trapper hat will make your head sweat

Review.Titre: A face hug.
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased a face gaiter and have been really pleased with it so far. It's made from a lightweight and breathable material that feels comfortable on my skin, even during intense physical activity like running or hiking.The gaiter has a stretchy fabric that easily covers my entire face and neck, and can be adjusted to fit snugly without feeling constricting. It's also versatile and can be worn in different ways, such as around the neck, as a headband or beanie, or even as a wristband.One thing I really appreciate about this gaiter is how easy it is to care for. It's machine washable and dries quickly, which is great for frequent use.Overall, I think this face gaiter is a great option for anyone looking for a comfortable and versatile face covering for outdoor activities or everyday wear. It provides excellent coverage, is easy to care for, and comes in a variety of colors and patterns to suit any style.

Review.Titre: Chat bot is annoying
Review.Contenu: Once another human being was involved with my experience today, it was 5 stars. The problem was getting there. I was disconnected from the chat bot multiple times and was never actually connected to a person. I was glad to get an email because I had given up on getting information.

Review.Titre: I have always had a good experience…
Review.Contenu: I have always had a good experience with SA. Recieved a package today with a missing item. Emailed the company and not only did I get a response immediately, they are sending the missing item right away.

Review.Titre: Well Done
Review.Contenu: Service was easy and delivery to Canada was within a reasonable time frame. Everything arrived as ordered. The trappers hat did have a odd smell to it however once I washed it, all was good. This is the second time ordering from SA Company, highly recommend it.

Review.Titre: One page said free shipping
Review.Contenu: One page said free shipping, another said spend “x” to get free shipping, did that then at checkout was told the purchase didn’t qualify. I guess that’s the way to make up on discounted prices.

Review.Titre: Trapper Hat
Review.Contenu: Hat could use an adjustable strap to make a tighter fit. Frustrating to see same hat a week after purchasing for half price on another site.

Review.Titre: Pretty easy to order
Review.Contenu: Pretty easy to order. Shipping was reasonable timed. No real problems whatsoever. Little upset that the hoodie pack I bought for $100 one day went on sale for $40 the next day but whatever.

Review.Titre: Definitely no issues with the product
Review.Contenu: Definitely no issues with the product. I thought the shipping took a little longer than I thought It would be but can’t directly say it was the company. All in all, I would Buy again!!

Review.Titre: Size is an issue
Review.Contenu: Liked the cold weather hat. Fits and is warm. The fleece neck wraps are not for big people. It felt like i was being choked. SA needs to consider a larger neck size for their products.

Review.Titre: For the price, no complaints!
Review.Contenu: For the price, no real complaints! The one bomber hat did have a funny smell, but it was solved after airing it out. It was very warm. I have a bigger melon, and it was still very roomy.

Review.Titre: Great Product!!!!
Review.Contenu: This isn't my first time ordering from SA, and definitely won't be my last. SA is always coming out with great products for  all occasions. I personally love my SA hoodie, and fur hat.

Review.Titre: The site is easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: The site is easy to navigate. I found most of what I was looking for. I hope you guys will sell “Boonie hats” again soon instead of “Bucket hats”. (My only complaint not complaint)

Review.Titre: The fleece face shields I use a lot…
Review.Contenu: The fleece face shields I use a lot working at a ski area. They keep you warm, have the proper length, which is important (to me). Durable for what it is, and very comfortable.

Review.Titre: The deal seems great for the silicone…
Review.Contenu: The deal seems great for the silicone rings. I wanted to order two thin blue line rings different sizes and it wouldn't let me. I really wanted one too. Waitifor order to see quality and how the shipping goes also.

Review.Titre: Products are good and durable
Review.Contenu: Products are good and durable. Don't put a time on deals when I get it done then I get it done. Don't rush when I am ordering something and need more time or looking at items

Review.Titre: Every item I order were great and…
Review.Contenu: Every item I order were great and inwould have given 5 stars if my Hoodie was correct. I ordered 2 hoodies and both the same size and only 1 fits and the other is way to small.

Review.Titre: Great sale prices on quality products…
Review.Contenu: Great sale prices on quality products and fast shipping.  I did have an issue with the website NOT honoring "free shipping" offering.  After numerous visits it finally worked .

Review.Titre: Great product fast shipping
Review.Contenu: The main ring that I wanted on your advertisement is like half black and half green with a green flag and it wasn’t an option when I ordered my rings. The rings are super comfortable to wear all day at my active outdoor job. The order I placed came to me quickly and everything was as ordered. If someone could reach out to me and help me get that one ring I wanted that would be awesome. Thank you

Review.Titre: Great deals and products
Review.Contenu: Great deals and products, hence why I keep ordering more...was supposed to get free shipping on my order, as I ordered more than $50 in product...unless I missed something

Review.Titre: My order address was messed up
Review.Contenu: My order address was messed up, and the order was returned to SA. I contacted SA and they shipped my order again within minutes. Really great experience.

Review.Titre: Great Quality, but Pricey shipping
Review.Contenu: We love the quality of these SA products! We have purchased several things from here. The hoodies are soo soft and the arm sleeves fit perfectly. The headlamp is bright and works great! Our orders arrived fairly quickly. We would order more but the shipping fee is a little outrageous. We just spent about $60 on some clearanced hoodies on our last order and payed $28 in shipping fees, there is no free shipping on clearance items. The website says, “You qualify for free shipping” but when I went to pay, it was adding the shipping fee on. Too bad that it’s not based on price to get the free shipping, we would definitely order a lot more. But that $28 shipping fee was almost the same price as 3 clearanced hoodies. And that’s for the basic, slowest shipping.  There are just too many other companies that offer free shipping. Great products though!

Review.Titre: 2nd time ordering
Review.Contenu: 2nd time ordering.  Had to wait a minute for my 2nd order to get in stock before I placed it.  They have been very responsive

Review.Titre: Fantastic company
Review.Contenu: Everything came in quick n are all fantastic. Only thing is hoodie is a little smaller then true to size.  I would recommend 1 size bigger for the hoodies.

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: Everything was super easy to use and the bundles are fantastic! Just wish the currency automatically converted to AUD at the checkout.

Review.Titre: Price didnt match BUT
Review.Contenu: Wasnt the advertised price for what i ordered but i loved all the print options and it filled all the wished of an autistic kid who is very particular.

Review.Titre: The rings look great
Review.Contenu: The rings look great, the face shield is cool as well. The ring box is perfect to store them. The only bad thing is the ring bag was not in the bag.

Review.Titre: Always great products
Review.Contenu: Always great products. Only thing could be easier is site use. Started from email for sale then had hard time navigating back to original start spot.

Review.Titre: Very happy with the service
Review.Contenu: Very happy with the service, sorted the issue with the order straight away.Confirmation email received instantly regarding order.I have shopped numerous times with no previous issues

Review.Titre: I thing i save the delivery but when i…
Review.Contenu: I thing i save the delivery but when i pay i see i should pay for it but when i put on cart you tell me it’s free shipping Sorry for my englosh

Review.Titre: I was happy with my neck warmers
Review.Contenu: I was happy with my neck warmers, except one of them was not sewn completely. I will just fix it because it is easier than trying to return it.

Review.Titre: Great products and customer service
Review.Contenu: Great products and customer service. Try to take advantage of free shipping when possible, shipping charges are brutal. Love the company tho.

Review.Titre: Great value,
Review.Contenu: I loved how they put their products on my news feed just at the right time, however I didn't get an estimated delivery date when checking out.

Review.Titre: I had a tough time trying to get the…
Review.Contenu: I had a tough time trying to get the orders in the cart but once my computer smartened up it worked well. Still waiting on a tracking number

Review.Titre: Missing items on my order
Review.Contenu: Was missing an item and sent an email,  customer service replied right away and placed a new order.  I really appreciate the quick response.

Review.Titre: I think yall are doing a good job but…
Review.Contenu: I think yall are doing a good job but the delivery was a little slow probably due to the time of year. We'll see how it goes from here on out

Review.Titre: Always nice to receive a free gift when…
Review.Contenu: Always nice to receive a free gift when making a purchase with SA Company. Not sure if date below is correct,  but it was around that time.

Review.Titre: Your website is easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: Your website is easy to navigate. Your prices are very reasonable. We are looking forward to receiving the hat I ordered for my husband.

Review.Titre: Thinner than they use to be...
Review.Contenu: They are no longer made with the thicker cotton or cotton blend material.  They are very thin and the ends are not sewn, and easily fray.

Review.Titre: Quality is Everything
Review.Contenu: I LOVE everything from SA Company. The quality of their products is the Best! I just wished they would ship to my location Koror, Palau!

Review.Titre: I would have given a five star
Review.Contenu: I would have given a 5 star but I only received half of my order. I understand mistakes happen and especially during this time of year.

Review.Titre: Repeat Customer recent order
Review.Contenu: Great pricing and package deals.  Quality of the hoodie seems to have gone up since my last order. Relatively quick delivery to Canada.

Review.Titre: Overview Products
Review.Contenu: Products are great some products seem a little high shipping is very slow other companies shipping faster but over all will buy again

Review.Titre: Service was good
Review.Contenu: Service was good. The only issue I thought the sweatshirts would of been thicker than what it is. They are very nice other than that.

Review.Titre: Great price on a hoodie
Review.Contenu: Great price on a hoodie. However, I spent more on the shipping then hoodie. I am not complaining, but it would have been 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Easy and fast shipping
Review.Contenu: Easy and fast shipping.  The trapper hat seemed too large (I think I have an average head size).  But it is cute color and design.

Review.Titre: Always exactly what I ordered and is…
Review.Contenu: Always exactly what I ordered and is sent quickly! Love the straw hats!!! But the shipping was too high!! $10. Would order more often but not for $10 for shipping! That’s almost half a hat!!!!

Review.Titre: Delivery took longer than expected
Review.Contenu: Delivery took longer than expected. Fleece face shield was damaged when arrived. But easy to get situation resolved. Thanks.

Review.Titre: Great Value, Some Inferior Product
Review.Contenu: I received a great value of 5 rings for the price of one. However, when I received the rings, one was cracked with a slit visible through the packaging.

Review.Titre: Experience was ok they offered free…
Review.Contenu: Experience was ok they offered free shipping then a discount then they took away free shipping I was a little disappointed.

Review.Titre: I enjoy all the different packets
Review.Contenu: I enjoy all the different packets, and how fast my items arrive. The bodies are my favorite, they are soft and roomy.

Review.Titre: Excellent
Review.Contenu: Excellent , Service was excellent! Choice’s we’re top notch. Not sure of the quality but hopefully good ! Thank you

Review.Titre: The website is very user friendly
Review.Contenu: The website is very user friendly!  I do wish that we were able to combine deals even if they are with clearance.

Review.Titre: The deals on here are great it takes…
Review.Contenu: The deals on here are great it takes awhile for shipping but understandable but it’s a great place to get stuff

Review.Titre: A ring was missing from my order
Review.Contenu: A ring was missing from my order. JOAN H was amazingly helpful l. He is what made this experience amazing

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Great customer service. Man rings are great women rings are just alright! But for what you pay not bad!

Review.Titre: Ordering was easy
Review.Contenu: Ordering was easy. Should ask how they did after you receive the order.

Review.Titre: It was good ,but the timer made me feel…
Review.Contenu: It was good ,but the timer made me feel rushed. It didn't gave me enough time to look around your site.

Review.Titre: Took a little longer to ship but seems…
Review.Contenu: Took a little longer to ship but seems like high quality products. The men in my family will be happy.

Review.Titre: Made it very easy to add to cart &…
Review.Contenu: Made it very easy to add to cart & checkout. Very simple and you get an email right away of purchase.

Review.Titre: Everything came as expected and he…
Review.Contenu: Everything came as expected and he loves the rings but I have to exchange them for a bigger size.

Review.Titre: Everything fine just the only thing is…
Review.Contenu: Everything fine just the only thing is the app you recommend for tracking the package is hacked

Review.Titre: Shipping was poor but they finally got…
Review.Contenu: Shipping was poor but they finally got here.  Items as described and at a good price.

Review.Titre: Great packaging
Review.Contenu: Great packaging.  Showing different ways to use product.  Great gift idea as well.  Thank you 😊

Review.Titre: Great products
Review.Contenu: Well they have great products and work really well for what you need to stay warm or a sleeve.

Review.Titre: They really do care!
Review.Contenu: Florence single handedly saved future buisness as far as I’m concerned. What started off as Christmas shopping turned into a nightmare. Florence was quick to resolve the issue and held a level of excellence when it came to communication. She has been a blessing to deal with and has saved Christmas! It’s employees like Florence that make successful organizations. She should be rewarded!

Review.Titre: Quickly resolved my issue without much…
Review.Contenu: Quickly resolved my issue without much trouble! Very quick to respond too. Great company with great service!

Review.Titre: Customer Service
Review.Contenu: After a very rough patch, SA's customer service Queen , Florance resolved a delivery issue the way you would expect customer service representative to handle a problem.Florence was kind, empathetic, diligent in tracking down a missing order, and communicated updates with personal phone calls. SA needs more like Florence on their roster.What SA management doesn't under stand or is not willing to adress is the terrible robotic "live chats, and an 800 number for customer service that no one answers. To save money, I guess, SA has taken the human interaction out of their business. There is nothing more frustrating to a buyer with a problem, than being relegated to a robot or a call center outside of the USA. Another issue SA needs to address regards the 2 logistic company's SA contracts with. Neither have a rating above 1 out of 5.Thank goodness there is someone named Florence that was a breathe of fresh air. Florence earned a 5 star rating

Review.Titre: This company is superb
Review.Contenu: This company is superb.  I ordered some sleeves for a lady undergoing cancer treatment to cover up her ugly medical compression sleeves.  They arrived so promptly that they gave her an immediate boost and we are thankful that the treatment seems to be going really well and best of all, she is happy!

Review.Titre: I had an issue with my online order…
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with my online order processing. The customer service chat was able to resolve my problem quickly and get my order to process. Thanks for the help

Review.Titre: LOVE !!!
Review.Contenu: I've been ordering apparel from SA Fishing Company since 2020. I absolutely LOVE their stuff. I use the fleece face shields for skiing/snowmobiling/hunting in the winter here in AB and it never fails to keep me warm in our -35° climates. Will always recommend them! Their hoodies are so comfy too, and customer service is top notch! Thank you SA!

Review.Titre: Excellent shopping experience!!!
Review.Contenu: Excellent shopping experience!!!Ordered some silicone rings and face shields and they are perfect.Great website, huge variety of products, extremely helpful and responsive customer service support. The Live chat makes it so quick and easy to speak to a member of the team. I look forward to building up my collection of SA items!

Review.Titre: Customer service
Review.Contenu: Bought a hoodie from them about a month and the pockets started to rip. I reached out to the customer service department and they are sent me a new hoodie. Plus i had the best customer service agent and she was really helpful. Will recommend this company

Review.Titre: I love the products SA offer and only…
Review.Contenu: I love the products SA offer and only wish i could buy more. I couldn't find any info about the delivery of my latest order so jumped on the Live Chat and once put in contact with Karol Z my questions and queries were settled and sorted in minuets. Really good customer service!!!

Review.Titre: My mix up their fix up
Review.Contenu: Just awesome customer service! Had I done proper measurement we wouldn't be in this "mess" I messed up and they fix it! Truly awesome! Thank you SA Company!!!

Review.Titre: My order was received on different days
Review.Contenu: My order was received on different days. When I realized that one item wasn't received, I contacted SA customer service via email. I received a response in less than 12 hours.

Review.Titre: Great products and great customer service!
Review.Contenu: I love the sleeves from SA Co, they not only fit perfect but the designs are awesome! Recently had a mix up in a shipment and Joan took care of my issue right away. Top notch company with top notch people working there. Thank You all at SA Co!!!!

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Great customer service, took care of my issues quickly. Very nice and polite,no hesitation on making things right. Will be buying more items from SA, that this was my first order from them great experience.

Review.Titre: They sent the wrong sweater by accident
Review.Contenu: They sent the wrong sweater by accident Sent me a new one without me sending the other one back. Awesome 5 starts will be purchasing fr9m them again. The sweaters, face shield and hats are amazing

Review.Titre: So far so good
Review.Contenu: So far so good. Had a technical issue with the website when trying to pay. Reported it and had a reply within a few hours. Staff friendly and informative. Hopefully the order will get here soon as most of the negative stuff here appears to be want happens after ordering.

Review.Titre: I have done two orders with SA and both…
Review.Contenu: I have done two orders with SA and both experiences have been smooth and easy. The first order I ordered the wide brim straw hats and I got them a day earlier than expected the second order I ordered some of the silicone rings a new bucket hat and I got notified that there was an issue with shipping it was corrected quickly and I got new tracking and shipping information while I was still in the chat. Great service all the way around from start to finish and there is always some willing to help

Review.Titre: Jones form customer service is great…
Review.Contenu: Jones form customer service is great and vary helpful my order was lost somehow and she jumped on and reordered it right away. Vary helpful and polite need my customer support reps like her

Review.Titre: Very helpful service reps
Review.Contenu: Very helpful service reps ,  solvingcustomers issues,questions, and helpful robot and human chat line. Back to me within 24 hour window with answers and resolutions . Good summer deals still happening on their sight!

Review.Titre: Great customer experience
Review.Contenu: Was a bit wary purchasing hats from USA when I am in the UK but looking online at local companies, design wise nothing came close!Really like the designs of the bucket hats so bit the bullet and ordered two (blue one with what looks like water under the rim & a black one with neon yellow under the rim).They arrived in 7 days which was much quicker than expected and after raising a query, had a great customer service experience with JoanI would definitely recommend - now I just need to wait for some sunshine in this British weather to make use of my hats!

Review.Titre: Fantastic Customer Service!!!
Review.Contenu: I have ordered several items over the years from SA. This last order put them over the top. USPS said that they delivered my last shipment. We did not receive it. Went to post office with no real resolution.  I had contacted SA to make sure it was sent. They even showed that it was delivered.  Today I received an email showing another order has been shipped. This is above and beyond customer service standards and I appreciate this. SA is Number 1 in my book!!!  Thank you Mike LaChapelle.

Review.Titre: 10/10 Customer service
Review.Contenu: Though some things where missing from my order the customer service was 10/10. They responded in less the 36 hours on Labor day weekend, and where responding to emails within 5 to 10 minutes. Best customer service experience ever! I will be back soon to shop for more.

Review.Titre: Best assistance so far
Review.Contenu: With my purchase, i had just recently moved and i had forgotten to change my address, i did the live chat and i had someone (a human, not a bot) reply and assist me in less than 10 minutes. I had a little bit of issues on my end and messaged back and forth via email, and even there i had someone reply back in just minutes. Best assistance/ service I've had so far.

Review.Titre: Amazing Customer service
Review.Contenu: Amazing Customer service. Received an item that was damaged. Went to their site and in under 2 minutes was chatting with a representative. I lost connection to the chat and was emailed by the representative a minute later to continue processing an item replacement. After a few emails later I had my replacement item ordered and set to be shipped out in 24-48 hours. The whole process was convenient and the customer service representative was polite and helpful .

Review.Titre: Place an order middle of August
Review.Contenu: Place an order middle of August. Got two of my three items. Contacted customer service today. The first of September. They asked for the order number. Asked what I didn't receive. Asked if I wanted to refund or reship. Said I would like reship. They recreated part of the order and advise they'll get it shipped out right away. Purchase from them in the past never had any issues. But they're taking care of me

Review.Titre: Customer service has been exceptional
Review.Contenu: Customer service has been exceptional, rarely seen in todays atmosphere. 2nd time ordering from SA and will not be the last.

Review.Titre: Best customer service!!
Review.Contenu: I bought a hat for the girlfriend she loved it!! I got a bullet antenna for my self, on installation I noticed the piece I needed broke off before I could even tighten it down. I emailed the company and they sent out a replacement asap!I understand it’s not your fault things break and it’s what we do next that defines the person or company we are. They are a stand up company for taking care of it swiftly, I appreciate that and I look forward to my next purchase from them!!

Review.Titre: I ordered 3 hats for my family
Review.Contenu: I ordered 3 hats for my family. When they arrived my husband’s was damaged. I contacted customer service and they got back to me within 24hours and got him a new hat on the way. I just had to send some photos of the damage and the customer service representative helped me get it resolved in just a few emails. My daughter and I love our hats and have already gotten compliments from friends at the lake!!!! Happy fishing y’all!!!

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: I ordered two hats, when I received them, one was perfect, the other had stitching coming out and was a defect. I contacted customer service and sent in videos of both hats for comparison. Karol quickly and professionally handled getting me a replacement. There customer service is great! I will definitely be ordering more through them again!

Review.Titre: Great silicone rings
Review.Contenu: I work on electrical equipment therefore I don't wear my actual wedding band I wear silicone. I've recently ordered my second set of silicone rings from SA because they look great, fit great and you just can't beat the price. I've purchased silicone rings from others in the past, but SAfishing has them all beat!

Review.Titre: Awesome customer service
Review.Contenu: Awesome customer service! They helped correct a problem that I created not paying attention to an old address and they were an extremely helpful group over there. Thank you so much.

Review.Titre: Joan H from customer service chat was…
Review.Contenu: Joan H from customer service chat was very helpful.  I just got my SA box in and my straw hat had a tear in it and Joan was super helping in sending me an email so I can upload a picture. She was prompt and courteous and was able to help me by sending a new replacement hat so my husband would have it for Father’s Day.  Great experience with customer service chat!

Review.Titre: Perfect product for teenage boys
Review.Contenu: I buy your sweatshirts for my two grandsons. I noticed they live in your hoodies so I asked one grandson why he liked the SA hoodies and he said they are warmer, longer in sleeves and length and he likes the bit of color inside the hood. I usually get them a SA hoodie for Christmas but have bought more after I noticed they live in them. Also whenever I have any problems with making an order when I send a message I always get a quick response. Great customer service, great shipping and perfectly great product.

Review.Titre: 5 star customer Service…
Review.Contenu: Had a simple mistake in transit somewhere. SA company customer service went way out of there way to fix it and honestly went too far to make it right. They just earned a return customer forever and I’ll suggest them to anyone as a standup company to order from.

Review.Titre: Pleasant experience!!!…
Review.Contenu: Had a pleasant experience dealing with the text line. I initially made a phone call and left a voicemail. I was contacted back in less than 24 hours to my surprise. I had an issue with my order and they handled the problem with no questions ask. Thank you SA customer service for the great jobs.

Review.Titre: Shipping issue but great customer service!
Review.Contenu: Have shopped at SA several times and unfortunately this time around, DHL seemed to have lost our order. I contacted SA asking an order update and they informed me about the shipping issue. Due to a time constraint, I couldn’t wait on them to ship the items again so I requested a refund. The customer service rep I was dealing with, through email, was super nice, apologized several times and issued us a refund very quickly. So this review is more about the great customer service we received. I appreciate the way this was handled and will certainly continue to shop with them!

Review.Titre: I really needed to get help from…
Review.Contenu: I really needed to get help from customer service. They responded super fast with the nicest attitude. Not only did they take care of my issue, but was extremely fast in doing so. They rock, and I would recommend SA Company to everyone. High quality of products, as well as great designs. Thank you Joan again.

Review.Titre: Bit of an issue, but fixed quickly!
Review.Contenu: Had a little bit of a hiccup with my original order but customer service quickly handled the situation and got my order corrected and shipped off to me, now I'm just waiting to see how awesome they are in person!10/10 recommend SA Co. and when someone asks me where I got my ring, I'll be sure to send them exactly where they need to go!

Review.Titre: I recently placed an order for five…
Review.Contenu: I recently placed an order for five silicone rings and received them quickly. However, one of the five rings did not fit properly so I contacted the company using the number provided to send a text message. I got a quick response and I provided them with my order information. Within a few minutes they reordered my ring in a different size with no charge and I am awaiting the delivery of my ring now.

Review.Titre: Great customer care!
Review.Contenu: I'm always appreciative when a company takes care of their customer! That care starts with each individual employee! Karol doesn't know me and could've easily read my "missing 1 sleeve" email and decided to sit on for a day or 2. I always feel sometimes non face to face customer service specialist have that option!......not so with Karol! My email was replied to immediately and the missing 1 sleeve was replaced just as fast! I love that! It shows Karol not only cares about the reputation of her company but for the 1 of many customers - who himself is feeling special 😊. I don't know about you but that's how you keep customers! Thank you Karol!

Review.Titre: Hands down the best customer service in…
Review.Contenu: Hands down the best customer service in a long time!! I ordered a specific item (which I swore I ordered a different one) I reached out to get the correct item. Not only did they send me the item for free.. They told me to go ahead an keep the other item!! Amazing customer service! I will definitely be ordering from them more often! Thank You!!

Review.Titre: Love the products
Review.Contenu: Love the products, great deal on a bundle for arm sleeves. Sizing was great and the quality was good sporty material (even for summer). Shipping takes longer than expected, but still fairly fast (about a week) so don't get impatient this isn't Amazon.

Review.Titre: This was my 3rd time ordering
Review.Contenu: This was my 3rd time ordering. The products are wonderful for lots of reasons.  They are well made and comfortable.  When I saw the fleece face shields I knew I needed them to keep warm while outside this winter.  I am a member of the Mandalorian Mercs costume club and knew the white fleece shield would be perfect for my costume and would keep my nose cozy. I ordered a few more items, black for the hubs, and the nebula because I love the pattern.  I received everything very quick. Unfortunately the white face smile I received was substituted for a different pattern.  I first checked my order to see if it was my mistake.  It was not.  I contacted customer service and Karol was AMAZING.  She emailed me back apologizing for the mix up and got the corrected white face shield reordered for me and made sure I received the order information and shipping details.I did not expect such fast and easy customer service.  I love the products and would encourage any  people looking for cosplay gaiters to cover their necks and to keep warm to order from SA Company.I also encourage outdoor enthusiasts to do the same! They are SOOOO good!

Review.Titre: SA Company offers great customer…
Review.Contenu: SA Company offers great customer service.I was not able to receive purchases bought.I live in a rural area where PO Boxes are all that is available. They do not deliver to PO Boxes andI was refunded immediately. As soon as they useUPS or Fedex I will be loyal customer.

Review.Titre: Joan was very helpful in assisting me…
Review.Contenu: Joan was very helpful in assisting me with resolving my exchange. Thank you all for your great customer service.

Review.Titre: Great Company, Great Service, Great Products
Review.Contenu: We received our shipment super quick. One of the rings was wrong in our shipment. I emailed them and within minutes had a response and then a shipping confirmation of the correct ring! The quality and fit of SA rings is phenomenal! 100% recommend! Great Quality, Great Service, Great Company!!

Review.Titre: Great products and service.
Review.Contenu: Ordered the bucket hat with sunglasses, floppy straw hat and cooling neck gaiter. Everything came except the bucket. Emailed them to let them know and got an immediate response and they sent the bucket hat right away. Great products and service.

Review.Titre: I wore the arm shields when I rode an…
Review.Contenu: I wore the arm shields when I rode an electric scooter and I had wiped out hard onto the cement and the shield didn’t rip at all and it saved me from a bunch of road rash if I could I’d give these an 100/5

Review.Titre: I placed my second order with them last…
Review.Contenu: I placed my second order with them last weekend. They were out of stock on two rings that I ordered and when I contacted them they had excellent customer service and replaced the two rings with two others that were in stock and put in for shipping right away. Could not have asked for a better customer service. They will definitely get more orders from me

Review.Titre: Quick response to resolving my issue
Review.Contenu: Quick response to resolving my issue! It was my fault, and SA Company still replaced my order. I was really impressed, and very happy with the experience and the company. Thanlk you so much!! I will definitely be ordering again :)

Review.Titre: SA Goes Above and Beyone
Review.Contenu: My fiancee and I recently purchased the silicone rings and a set of sleeves for myself to wear when fishing. As a courtesy, SA offered two free sleeves with our order. When we received everything we were impressed with the quality of the bands, storage box and sleeves. However the free sleeves that were included were much smaller in size and neither of us could use them.  I sent SA an electronic message on Memorial Day with a suggestion for future orders to include same size items when giving away freebies. I received a response within minutes thanking me for my feedback. Although it wasn't necessary, they insisted on sending me another set of sleeves which was greatly appreciated. I have ordered from this company in the past and have always been pleased with them. SA went above and beyond to make sure I was a satisfied customer and I will continue to use them in the future.

Review.Titre: So I made a little mistake and…
Review.Contenu: So I made a little mistake and accidently put the wrong shipping address in yesterday when I ordered a "black digi camo vehicle antenna" for my truck. All I had to do was go to the SA Company website and contact their customer service through their chat-box on the site. A customer service representative responded promptly and was able to rectify my error so now my order will be shipped to the correct address. I love all of their products, they're very well made and are great if you are a patriot who loves the outdoors!

Review.Titre: Amazing (SA) service
Review.Contenu: Fantastic service and very quick response to my query about missing item on my order. Amazing customer service from Joan H at SA

Review.Titre: We absolutely love your hoodies
Review.Contenu: We absolutely love your hoodies. The only downfall of everything that We have dealt with with you guys is that the sunflower hoodies have been unavailable for some time. As soon as you can tell me you have a large sunflower hoodie available. I am buying that thing. Please let me know when it is available. My wife is a sunflower fanatic and loves the SA hoodies and needs a sunflower hoodie.

Review.Titre: The product is amazing
Review.Contenu: The product is amazing. The deals they have amazing also. Sign up for email and text you will be informed of deals and sales going in. Double plus. My favorite product is the fleece face shield. Great during the cold. I use the other face shields for top my head to keep the fly away hairs down. During summer time at work with fans on my hair will blow all over the place. Put one on top your head will keep the hair in place. Along with dust and dirt will get all over the shield.  Another amazing factor is this companies customer service is on point. Very helpful no matter your questions. Joan amazing job. SA company keep up the good work.

Review.Titre: Customer service
Review.Contenu: I recently made a good size order, I’m located in Canada, and one of my items was missing when I received my order. Customer service was fantastic and had my missing item on the way before we were even off the phone.  SA is great service with great products!

Review.Titre: Mega customer service from Joan H
Review.Contenu: I ordered the item and PayPal / Facebook used my old address . SA sorted it straight away no quibble brilliant customer service from Joan H

Review.Titre: My order was for two and I only got…
Review.Contenu: My order was for two and I only got one. I contacted them and immediately was told a replacement will be shipped. So far so good, great customer service for me.Update: received the missing part of the order immediately, great job!

Review.Titre: I purchased two item but separately
Review.Contenu: I purchased two item but separately. First item took a little longer then a week, the other arrived within a week using regular shipping and in good condition. Items were as described

Review.Titre: Lost order
Review.Contenu: I had sent thru an order to an alternate email and I messaged them concerned it hadn’t gone thru. They were quick to find the order and reassure me after I supplied some information on it.

Review.Titre: Quick thoughtful service
Review.Contenu: I went into a panic thinking I forgot to add my address to my shipping address. Joan responded right away in an email to my phone call. Couldn’t have eased my worry faster!

Review.Titre: Best customer service experience
Review.Contenu: Best customer service experience I've had. Very polite and quick. Everything was to the point. Will definitely be ordering from this company in the future and if you were on the fence just do it.

Review.Titre: Fantastic product
Review.Contenu: Fantastic product, works super well on the building site, held up really well on a couple of occasions. shipped really quickly to New Zealand turned up in great condition

Review.Titre: Entered wrong address
Review.Contenu: I accidentally sent my order to an old address and they canceled that order and made a new one for me with no extra charge. Truly a company that looks after their customers

Review.Titre: Ordered a 8-pack of buffs for a fishing…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a 8-pack of buffs for a fishing trip in Mexico. They were excelent and kept our faces protected. I will also be wearing them for sunny days on the mountain skiing and I'm confident they will work well.

Review.Titre: Customer service is great
Review.Contenu: One of the hats we received wasn't the best quality. I emailed customer service with some pictures and without any hesitation or hassle they sent me a new hat.

Review.Titre: Karol was amazing
Review.Contenu: Karol assisted me with exchanging for another sized ring. Super easy, communication was exceptional. Order confirmation for new sized rings the next day! Thank you!

Review.Titre: I love the products they sell
Review.Contenu: I love the products they sell. My order did take 2 weeks to get to me. When unpacking I did find a small rip in one of the hats. It was just the stitching it appears in production the stitch missed the hat so there was a small hole. I took a picture and sent it to customer service and that was by far the quickest customer service I’ve ever received. I have a new hat coming my way. So I’m very pleased with this company and their products.

Review.Titre: Missing item in my order
Review.Contenu: Missing item in my order. Contact customer service via chat and they quickly place an order for the missing item without asking any questions.Super custome service support

Review.Titre: Sleeves are good quality
Review.Contenu: Sleeves are good quality, look like they'll hold up fine. Lengthwise, they go up to about just under the shoulder muscle, which is sufficient for me. Colors are vibrant, stitching looks fine. They held up in the wash ok, I hung them to dry though. Wish i had gotten a design one, but maybe for the next purchase. Thanks for reading, stay safe

Review.Titre: Hat cam in with the string frayed and I…
Review.Contenu: Hat cam in with the string frayed and I contacted customer service and Joan H helped me quickly get another hat on its way! Great customer service!

Review.Titre: I received a defective product
Review.Contenu: I received a defective product, mistakes happen and I understand that. Customer service verified the defect and reacted swiftly to provide me with a replacement product. They made the process simple and painless.

Review.Titre: I ordered the 5 ring bundle and…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the 5 ring bundle and notified them I only received 4 rings. They returned my email within 10 minutes and sent me the missing ring next day. I’m beyond amazed at the customer service! This is how it’s supposed to be down!!!

Review.Titre: Absolutely fantastic service
Review.Contenu: Absolutely fantastic service! Ordered a bundle pack and wanted to swap one hat for another and had no problem doing so. Thanks again

Review.Titre: Exceptional customer service!!…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for a few items and at checkout, chose the option to add a last minute purchase. I added a hat that was on sale to my order. After receiving my order, I noticed the hat was not included. After checking my order on the website, I saw it was a separate transaction with separate shipping. I contacted customer service because I did not have the order number for that hat to check the status. The lady helping me, Joan, was able to look up my order and inform me that the hat was no longer available. She assured me that I could choose any of the others as a replacement and it would be shipped out right away. I actually liked the replacement choice better. So this was a win-win for me, as I only paid $10 for the sale hat and was replaced for the same hat (with different words) that I liked even better! Still I did not have the pay the full price and I think that was an exceptional solution. In a day and age where it’s hard to fine good personal “customer service”, Joan’s responses and attention were very refreshing and reassuring that there really are people who care about the customer on the other end!!
